steps.nodeStepDescription: This weapon causes kinetic damage.
Rapidly landing precision hits will return one round to the magazine.
Improved accuracy while airborne.
This weapon's magazine will be refilled whenever you unleash your Super.
Quick unassisted kills with this weapon reduce grenade and melee cooldown.
This weapon gains a boost to range and handling when health is low.
This weapon becomes more accurate as your health gets lower.
Chance to refill this weapon's magazine when critically wounded.
Kills with this weapon while critically wounded have a chance to start regenerating health.
This weapon gains increased reload and handling when two or more enemies are in close proximity.
This weapon gains bonus damage when three or more enemies are in close proximity.
This weapon gains improved range and handling for a short time after revival.
Precision kills with this weapon cause the target to explode.
Radar stays active while aiming down this weapon's sights.
Missing a shot has a chance to return ammo directly to the magazine.
Kills with this weapon reduce the cooldown of your grenade.
One random bullet in the magazine causes considerable bonus damage.
Aiming this weapon is incredibly fast.
This weapon can be drawn unbelievably fast.
This weapon is effective at an extended range.
Increases weapon stability.
Reload this weapon quickly.
Switch weapons faster. Move quicker while aiming.
A larger magazine.
When held, this weapon grants +2 character Agility.

Minimal iron sights. 
Improves weapon handling.

Omolon holo sights. 
Improves weapon handling.

Omolon close quarters combat sights. 
CQ optics, improved target acquisition.

Omolon imaging technology. 
Highlights enemy targets.

Ranged combat scope. 
Improved optics and range.

Omolon imaging technology. 
Highlights long-distance enemy targets at optimal combat range.
